author: Charles Passy
title: The Top Ticket at Brooklyn Museum’s David Bowie Exhibit Costs $2,500
text:
If you are planning on attending the much-anticipated “David Bowie is” exhibition at the Brooklyn Museum, be prepared to open your wallet.
The museum is dispensing with its usual pricing—a suggested $16 contribution for adults—and charging a mandatory fee of $20 on weekdays and $25 on weekends. The show about the late rock star runs from March 2 to July 15.
